dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4873 IH: To codify Executive Order 14319 (relating to preventing woke AI in the Federal Government).
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Patronis (for himself, Mr. Collins, Ms. Tenney, and Mrs. Houchin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14319 (relating to preventing woke AI in the Federal Government).

section.text: Executive Order 14319 (90 Fed. Reg. 35389; relating to preventing woke AI in the Federal Government) shall have the force and effect of law.
